venue.name: Winding Trails Cross Country Ski Center

item.description:
OK, it's been cold enought for snow making to work on the outer loop of trails at Winding Trails Cross Country Ski Center (Skater;s Loop, see map, red trail). Let's meet for a morning of cross country skiing!

Let's meet at "The Lodge" (see the map, lower-left) outside the entrance on the back-right (as seen from the parking lot) 9 AM - 9:15 AM (place opens at 9 AM). My picture is accurate for my looks. ;-) I'll be around to ski until about 12:30 PM, then I have to head off to lead the hike at 2:30 PM.

Ski Trail pass is $12. Rental equipment (skis, boots, poles) is available for $15. Lessons are available from staff at the center at 9:30 AM for $15 those who want to learn!

Winding Trails Cross Country Ski Center
